attributes.action: immediately be removed from Power as he was not voted in by the British Public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We didnt vote for Brown, the country voted for Blair. Enough said. Please lets change our constitution so that unvoted PMs cant be in power.They will probably not allow this petition anyway so what is the point when the Labour Governemt tels us "its listening"

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
